Tests that adding a new rule works properly with user input.

Is editing? true

element.style { ()

[expanded] 
div#inspected { (inspector-stylesheet:1 -> inspector-stylesheet:1:16)
    : ;

[expanded] 
div { (user agent stylesheet)
    display: block;

======== Inherited from html ========

    color: -internal-root-color;
